column5: Planning a primitive camping trip on Nipigon for 2018. Anyone have GPS coordinates for a good camp site in McIntyre? Public responses are great but feel free to PM me if you prefer. Thanks

I may be wrong, but I thought I read a post by Mike Borger a while back suggesting that the best way to truly experience Nipigon would be to be mobile and camp on various islands every night. Pretty sure that was the lake he was talking about, but could be wrong. May ask him.

If I'm thinking of the same comment as you are he said the best way to fish it is to camp. He didn't specify moving every day. Breaking and re-establishing camp every day is not something I care to do. Thanks though.
Andrew Bunker aka Moosebunk. Do a search he's done multiple reports on exactly what you are looking for
I've been in contact with Moosebunk, and read most of his posts, and he's been very helpful on several topics but he has no knowledge of campsites in McIntyre.
